original_title: One injured in shooting in Thalpe
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – One person has been injured in a shooting in Thalpe, in Habaraduwa.
Police say that the injured is a 30-year-old resident of Navimana.
A group of individuals who claimed to be Police officers had arrived at the victim's residence, and taken him away in a car.
Investigations revealed that the group then shot the individual in the leg, and abandoned him in Thalpe.
The injured person is currently receiving treatment at the Karapitiya hospital.
